div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
هذا كتاب من يوسف بن عبد اللّه
الحسن بن ورزان عاملي الأمير إبرهيم
بن يحيى أعز اللّه نصره على مدر ورزم بر
اه لمبر بن پك اپا ڤپصپا
ممّا صار عليك من خراج سنة
ست وأربعين ومئة
عشرة دراهم قبضنــاها منك
وبرئت إلينا منها
وكتب لغرّة ذو القعدة سنة
سبع وأربعين ومئة

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
hāḏā kitāb:un min yūsufa bni ʿabdi ăl lāhi
wa ăl ḥasani bni warazāna ʿāmilayi ăl ʾamīri ʾibrāhīma
bni yaḥyà ʾaʿazza ăl lāhu naṣra hu ʿalà madra wa rizma barāʾaẗ:un
li mīri bni baka ʾin nā qabaḍnā min ka
mimmā ṣāra ʿalay ka min ḫarāǧi sanaẗi
sitt:in wa ʾarbaʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in
ʿašaraẗa darāhima qabaḍnā hā min ka
wa bariʾta ʾilay nā min hā
wa kutiba li ġurraẗi ḏū ăl qaʿdaẗi sanaẗa
sabʿ:in wa ʾarbaʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in

In the name of God, the Merciful and Compassionate.
This is a document from Yūsuf ibn ʿAbd Allāh and
al-Ḥasan ibn Warazān, the two financial administrators of the governor ʾIbrāhīm
ibn Yaḥyā, may God strengthen his victory, (whose jurisdiction is) over Madr and Rizm,
a quittance for Mīr ibn Bēk. We have received from you
what you owe with regard to kharāj of the year
one hundred and forty-six
ten dirhams. We received them from you
and you have become released from (the obligation to pay) it to us.
It has been written at the beginning of Dhū al-Qaʿdah, in the year
one hundred and forty-seven.
